game.name: Truck License Trainer
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Drive a simulated truck to gain knowledge and intuition of a real thing while having fun. Challenge yourself with real-life scenarios or almost impossible maps.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Drive a simulated truck to gain knowledge and intuition of a real thing while having fun. Challenge yourself with real-life scenarios or almost impossible maps.
